car.shared.views
Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CarOrientor, CarViewer, MovableImageView, Viewer, WireFrameView
public interface Drawable

Specifies a class that knows how to draw itself. Generally used with Widgets that contain canvass that need to be redrawn in response to certain events.

Author:
Joshua Little

Method Summary
Modifier and Type Method and Description
 boolean draw()
          Tells this Drawable to draw itself if it needs to.
 void invalidate()
          Sets an internal flag forcing this Drawable to redraw itself on the next call to draw().
 void redraw()
          Forces this Drawable to redraw itself.
 

Method Detail

draw

boolean draw()
Tells this Drawable to draw itself if it needs to.

Returns:
whether the Drawable ended up redrawing itself.

redraw

void redraw()
Forces this Drawable to redraw itself.

invalidate

void invalidate()
Sets an internal flag forcing this Drawable to redraw itself on the next call to draw().
